items.title: Baseus 100W USB-C cable with LED display monitors power output in realtime at just $9 today (52% off)
items.summary:
Baseus 100W 6.6-foot USB-C cable with LED

Buy for $9 (Reg. $19)

What we love

The highlight of this Baseus USB-C cable is its built-in LED display on the connector that shows real-time power output. It’s a 6.6-foot cord with braided design for added durability, and it supports up to 100W fast charging along with 480MB/s data transfer speeds. It’s hard to go wrong with this one, especially at its discounted price today, if you’re in the market for a new cable.

items.summary:
As part of its Semi-Annual sale, Lenovo is offering the new Xbox Breaker Series special edition controllers for $53.99 shipped when you enter promo code TEAMGREEN at checkout. The Breaker lineup — including the Ice Breaker, Storm Breaker, and Heart Breaker models — launched last month at $80 and recently dropped to $70 at Amazon. Lenovo’s deal goes even further with an extra $16 off, bringing these new models to their lowest price yet. The code works for all three variants, so grab your favorite one while the offer lasts after getting more details below.

items.title: Regularly $1,600 LG UltraGear 39-inch 240Hz WQHD OLED curved gaming monitor is nearly 50% off at $850 all-time low
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops LG’s UltraGear 39-inch 240Hz WQHD OLED curved gaming monitor down to $849.99 shipped. This is regularly a $1,600 display, which is now seeing a straight-up 47% discount for Prime members. Today’s deal shaves a whopping $750 off its usual going rate, landing it $26 below its fall Prime Day low from earlier this week. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this monitor to date, and it’s a good option to consider if you’re in the market for a new OLED display for your battlestation. You’ll also find the 34-inch variant of this model down at $688.94 shipped with a solid 51% discount on its usual going rate. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: The Minecraft movie is getting a sequel
items.summary: A Minecraft Movie is getting a sequel, and according to a post on X, the new film will debut in theaters on July 23rd, 2027. items.title: Reflection AI raises $2B to be America’s open frontier AI lab, challenging DeepSeek
items.summary: Reflection, once focused on autonomous coding agents, has raised $2B at an $8B valuation to expand into both an opensource alternative to closed frontier labs like OpenAI and Anthropic, and a Western equivalent to Chinese AI firms like DeepSeek.

items.title: Nintendo just revealed three new SNES games for Switch Online: Mario, Wario, Bubsy, and more
items.summary:
Nintendo has now revealed a new set of Super Nintendo games landing on Nintendo Classics for Switch Online members. Last we checked in the Game Boy Advance lineup got a nice little update, but today we are turning our attention back to the iconic SNES with three new releases for the first October 2025 Games Update.

If you missed out yesterday, the base model AirPods 4 low is gone but you can still score AirPods 4 with ANC down at $119 and the particularly notable AirPods Max (USB-C) deal at $429 on all five colors is still live (for now anyway – these deals could be gone at any second).

items.title: This feature-packed desk lamp with built-in USB-C power strip just hit $19 (Reg. $30)
items.summary:
Addtam 8-in-1 USB-C Desk Lamp

Buy for $19 (Reg. $30)

What we love

This lamp packs a lot of features into a small device. The light itself boasts three different color temperature options, but it doesn’t stop there. You’ll also find three AC outlets, two USB-A, and two Type-C ports. Another perk is that up top there is a tray where you can store a flash drive, pen, and more.

Clip the on-page 10% off coupon.

If you’re anything like me, a crooked picture frame or TV on the wall drives you nuts. That’s why I invested in a laser level like this a couple of years ago. Now I can dial in a perfect look each time I go to hang something on the wall.

items.title: Mammotion’s YUKA Mini 500H and 700H robotic lawn mowers get $350 price cuts starting from a $649 low (Reg. $999+)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Mammotion is offering continued Prime Day savings on its YUKA Mini 500H Robotic Lawn Mower at $649 shipped, as well as its YUKA Mini 700H Robotic Lawn Mower at $849 shipped. These two models usually fetch $999 and $1,199 at full price, with this being the second-ever price cut to the YUKA Mini 500H’s all-time low with $350 cut from its tag, while the YUKA Mini 700H is getting the same sized price cut to its second-lowest rate – landing $100 above the one-time low that lasted only three days in September.

more…

COOFANDY One-Button Tuxedo Jacket

Buy for $31 (Reg. $58)

What we love

If you have a formal event on the docket, today’s offer will let you dress the part without having to spend a fortune. There are loads of sizes and styles of this jacket to choose from, and pricing kicks off from just $31.

items.title: Leaf it to Plantum: Better care for your plants forever for $15 (Reg. $60)
items.summary:
If you’ve ever stopped mid-walk to ask a fern, “Are you actually a fern?”—same. Which is why I nearly squealed when I saw this Deal Days offer: Download Plantum for iOS and get lifetime access for $14.99 (reg. $59.99) with code GROW. Sale ends October 12 at 11:59 p.m. PT, so you have a little window before your monstera judges you.

more…

items.title: Goal Zero’s 500 Lumen Torch Light that doubles as a solar-charging 5,200mAh power bank hits $38 (Reg. $50)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Goal Zero 500 Lumen Torch Light at $37.89 shipped. Usually fetching $50 outside of discounts, this device dropped to $40 back April, with discounts since returning the costs to this same rate over the rest of the year – including for both July and this month’s Prime Day events. The savings seem to be sticking around after the event ended last night, giving you extra time to pick it up with $12 shaved from the tag at the best price of the year.

I’m actually using one of these surge protectors to power one corner of my office. I love how many outlets it has and the versatility with AC, USB-A, and Type-C ports in tow. Another perk of this unit is that it wall-mountable design if you’d like to make it easier to access.
